structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
GENERAL PROVISIONS APPLICABLE TO COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: The executive authority may appoint two (2) alternate members to serve on the code enforcement board in the absence of regular members. The appointment of alternate members shall be subject to the approval of the legislative body. Alternate members shall meet all of the qualifications and be subject to all of the requirements of KRS 65.8801 to 65.8839 that apply to regular members.
law.history: Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 177, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1996.
